blogPost.title: As manatee deaths spike and Florida rescue centers fill up with malnourished manatees, federal and state wildlife officials are taking an unprecedented step: They will provide food for hundreds of manatees in an urgent effort to get them through the winter.https://t.co/F39H7tODNA

previous.title: Ghislaine Maxwell has called the Metropolitan Detention Center "a living hell," but the judge overseeing her trial on sex trafficking and conspiracy charges has denied bail her four times, saying Maxwell poses "a substantial actual risk of flight." https://t.co/F0BdgOlHLi

localize.full_text: ギスレイン・マックスウェルはメトロポリタン拘置所を「生き地獄」と呼んでいるが、性売買と共謀罪の裁判を監督する判事は、マックスウェルが「実質的な逃亡の危険性がある」として4回も保釈を却下している。https://t.co/F0BdgOlHLi。
Ghislaine Maxwell称大都会拘留中心是 "活地狱"，但监督她因性交易和阴谋罪受审的法官已经四次拒绝了她的保释，称Maxwell构成了 "实质性的实际逃跑风险 "https://t.co/F0BdgOlHLi。
Ghislaine Maxwell稱大都會拘留中心是 "活地獄"，但監督她因性交易和陰謀罪受審的法官已經四次拒絕了她的保釋，稱Maxwell構成了 "實質性的實際逃跑風險 "https://t.co/F0BdgOlHLi。
